data.speaker: Player
data.content: My name is Liv. It's my first day of University... It's exciting, this is the start of a new chapter of my life...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I wish I could calm my nerves, I've never even set foot in this building before.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Ok... Deep Breath... Where to go first?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: My older brother told me where to go to get started.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I remember I scribbled it down in my notebook, I just need to read it...

data.speaker: System
data.content:
- Press (E) to open your inventory.
- Find the notebook in the inventory.
- Click the notebook.
